intro: Ludwigia alata, commonly known as red Ludwigia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Onagraceae. It is native to South America and is characterized by its striking red or pink bracts that resemble flowers. Ludwigia alata is popular in aquariums and water gardens due to its ornamental value and ease of cultivation.
